text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
Towards the Triple crown horse girl, Mihono Bourbon appears here 
at the Keito racetrack!

text_block_list.name: Cheers
text_block_list.text: (Cheering!!)

text_block_list.name: Spectator A
text_block_list.text:
Mihono Bourbon! show me the moment of 
the Triple Crown horse girl's birth!

text_block_list.name: Spectator B
text_block_list.text: I believe in your victory!

The (Kikkashou). The day of the confrontation between Rice Shower 
and Mihono Bourbon has finally arrived.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Bourbon-san… Follow her… Follow her. Then… Overtake her.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Rice Shower-san. It seems that you have marked me quite a bit.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Still, I will win first place.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Rice too, will not lose today.

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl with Straight-cut Bangs
text_block_list.text: Rice-san! Do your best!

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl with Black Bob-cut
text_block_list.text:
The (Kikkashou). its 3000m in turf, there is a chance for Rice, 
who is good at long distance, right?

text_block_list.name: Droopy-eyed Horsegirl
text_block_list.text:
However, there is no reason that Bourbon 
has not planned any countermeasures.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Hey, Trainer, what did you tell Rice?
Follow Bourbon and overtake.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Hmm…… Hey, that's all!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: It's not a mistake. Rice-san's power to follow is the real deal.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
However, rather than Bourbon herself, I'm worried about how the 
fans will react, when Rice wins they might――

text_block_list.name: Cheers
text_block_list.text: (Cheering!!)

As if to block Mejiro McQueen's words, The cheers before the 
start echoed in the race field.

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
it's now the start of The Kikkashou Award 
for the last glory of the classic race.
